table.name: vtiger_adocmaster
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_adocmaster` ( `adocmasterid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `adocmasterno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `adocmastername` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `nrdoc` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `doctype` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `docdate_from` date DEFAULT NULL, `docdate_to` date DEFAULT NULL, `tipo_anagrafica` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `adoc_account` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `valore` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `valuta` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `codice_iva` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `chiave_adocmasterid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `project` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `causaleadm` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `countryname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `countyname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `cityname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `address` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `projectrma` varchar(20) DEFAULT '', `projectcommessa` varchar(225) DEFAULT '', `accountcommittente` varchar(225) DEFAULT '', `accounttname` varchar(225) DEFAULT '', `clientaddress` varchar(225) DEFAULT '', `telefonocliente` varchar(225) DEFAULT '', `cellularecliente` varchar(225) DEFAULT '', `indirizzocommittente` varchar(225) DEFAULT '', `cap` varchar(20) DEFAULT '', `adoc_site` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `descdiffesterni` varchar(225) DEFAULT '', `cittacat` varchar(200) DEFAULT '', `produttore` varchar(120) DEFAULT '', `modelnumber` varchar(120) DEFAULT '', `serialnr` varchar(120) DEFAULT '', `desriparazione` varchar(220) DEFAULT '', `diffdichiarato` varchar(200) DEFAULT '', `cfiva` varchar(200) DEFAULT '', `linkvatexempt` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `linkpayment` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `impiva` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `nonimpiva` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `taxamount` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `totalamount` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `amount` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `adoc_dataconsegna` date DEFAULT NULL, `adoc_costotrasporto` varchar(10) DEFAULT '', `adoc_altricosti` varchar(10) DEFAULT '', `adoc_fornitore` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `nrtracking` varchar(20) DEFAULT '' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_adocmastercf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_adocmastercf` ( `adocmasterid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`adocmasterid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
